org.hibernate.shards.strategy.exit
Interface ExitStrategy<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcatenateListsExitStrategy, FirstNonNullResultExitStrategy
public interface ExitStrategy<T>

Classes implementing this interface gather results from operations that are executed across shards. If you intend to use a specific implementation in conjunction with ParallelShardAccessStrategy that implementation must be threadsafe.

Author:
maxr@google.com (Max Ross)
